mapper.select: SELECT /* userPage.userInfo */ A.USER_NUMB /* 회원번호 */ , A.USER_NAME /* 회원이름 */ , A.USER_NICK /* 회원닉네임 */ , A.USER_IDXX /* 회원아이디 */ , A.CELL_NUMB /* 회원 전화번호 */ , A.SELF_INTR /* 회원 자기소개 */ , getUserImage(A.FILE_SVNM,A.USER_NUMB) AS USER_IMAG /* 회원 프로필 사진*/ , B.FILE_PATH AS BACK_IMAG /* 회원 배경이미지 */ , returnCount(D.FOLW_COUNT) AS FOLW_COUNT /* 팔로워 수 */ , returnCount(C.FOLN_COUNT) AS FOLN_COUNT /* 팔로잉 수 */ , returnCount(E.GATH_COUNT) AS GATH_COUNT /* 개설한 게더 수 */ , returnCount(F.CLUB_COUNT) AS CLUB_COUNT /* 개설한 클럽 수 */ , returnCount(G.CHAL_COUNT) AS CHAL_COUNT /* 개설한 챌린지 수 */ , returnCount(E.GATH_COUNT) + returnCount(F.CLUB_COUNT) + returnCount(G.CHAL_COUNT) AS TOTAL_BOARD /* 개설한 총 모임 수 */ FROM TM_USERXM A LEFT JOIN TM_FILEXM B ON A.USER_NUMB = B.FILE_IDXX AND B.FILE_SEQC = 'XXX' LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(USER_NUMB) AS FOLN_COUNT , USER_NUMB FROM TB_FOLLOW GROUP BY USER_NUMB ) C ON A.USER_NUMB = C.USER_NUMB LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(FOLW_USER) AS FOLW_COUNT , FOLW_USER FROM TB_FOLLOW GROUP BY FOLW_USER ) D ON A.USER_NUMB = D.FOLW_USER LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS GATH_COUNT , USER_NUMB FROM TM_GATHER GROUP BY USER_NUMB ) E ON A.USER_NUMB = E.USER_NUMB LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS CLUB_COUNT , USER_NUMB FROM TM_CLUBXM GROUP BY USER_NUMB ) F ON A.USER_NUMB = F.USER_NUMB LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS CHAL_COUNT , USER_NUMB FROM TM_CHALNG GROUP BY USER_NUMB ) G ON A.USER_NUMB = G.USER_NUMB WHERE A.USER_NUMB = #{USER_NUMB}

SELECT B.COMD_CODE , B.COMD_NAME , SUBSTR(B.COMD_CODE,1,1) AS PARN_CODE , getCodeName('REGI_CODE', SUBSTR(B.COMD_CODE,1,1)) AS PARN_REGI FROM TB_URREGI A LEFT JOIN TB_CODEXD B ON A.REGI_CODE = B.COMD_CODE AND B.COMM_CODE = 'REGI_CODE' WHERE A.USER_NUMB = #{USER_NUMB} ORDER BY B.COMD_NAME
